title: What are the best sites for streaming movies? - Quora

response.answer_text: The best depends on your viewing taste, budget, etc. Some I would recommend checking out are: Netflix - Best known for its original programming and movie library. It also offers an array of kids and international programing and prior seasons of current hit TV shows . Hulu - Best for watching current season TV and throwback tv series. It also offers movies and original programming and allows add on content subscriptions (at an additional price) for HBO, Cinemax, Stars, and Showtime Amazon Prime - Movies, some older TV. Amazon also offers access to tons of add-on services (for additional price) including HBO, Showtime, Starz, Cinemax, CBS All Access, Shudder, and Internationl Options. Additionally Amazon Video on Demand offers you access to purchase a huge array of custom content for current and classic TV and movies Network Content: Streaming content is available by network in some cases. Options vary and include: Content requiring login to a television provider to access (Ex: AMC, BBC America, etc). limited free content streaming on demand (Ex:ABC, NBC, Fox, CBS, CW) Stand alone paid access (Ex: CBS all-access, HBO NOW) Free options: In addition, many Networks allow limited free content streaming on demand including ABC, NBC, Fox, CBS, CW There are also some free services that allow streaming movies and TV supported by ads. The best bets among these services include Kanopy, Hoopla, Pluto TV, Sony Crackle, Tubi TV, Vudu, and Xumo Live TV sreaming options: Also available are higher priced services offer live TV streaming. I wont discuss in detail but they include: Hulu with Live TVYouTube TVPlayStation VueSling TVDirectTV NOW

So, movie fans, if you're serious about this whole staying-in thing and catching up on the latest releases, let us offer you a few non-Netflix and chill options for streaming movies online (although yes, Netflix is in there too). The best if you're looking for a wide selection: Amazon PrimeThe best for movies you love: HuluThe best for easy streaming: NetflixThe best for popular movies: HBO Go / HBO NowThe best for actually free movie viewing: CrackleThe best for Hollywood films: iTunesThe best for international appeal: YouTubeThe best for hidden gems: PopcornflixThe best for free (with ads): VuduThe best for true cinephiles: FilmstruckAbove list are the best movie streaming websites worth considering.
